details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.8 Extension schemas - Container schema fields
details.description: Extension schema descriptions shall be specified using the PDF/A extension schema description schema defined in this clause.

rule.description: Extension schema descriptions shall be specified using the PDF/A extension schema description schema defined in this clause.

error.message: An extension schema object contains field(s) %1 not defined by the specification
